qas.question: What's the four-letter abbreviation for technically minded technical and further education institutes?
What is the new name of the Northern Melbourne Institute of TAFE?

context: Since the mid-1990s, the term has been applied to some technically minded technical and further education (<a0_0>TAFE<a0_0/>) institutes. A recent example is the <a1_0>Melbourne Polytechnic<a1_0/> rebranding and repositioning in 2014 from Northern Melbourne Institute of TAFE. These primarily offer vocational education, although some like Melbourne Polytechnic are expanding into higher education offering vocationally oriented applied bachelor degress. This usage of the term is most prevalent historically in NSW and the ACT. The new terminology is apt given that this category of institution are becoming very much like the institutes of the 1970s–1990s period.
